description:
Title: Director of Development and Partnerships

Company: Modernized Marketing

Type: Full-time, Remote (9-6 pm EST)

Salary:$80K Base + Performance Based Incentives of $110K+ OTE

Modernized Marketing Team Overview:

At Modernized Marketing, we are a leading digital marketing agency, known for transforming ads into dynamic assets for business growth. Our expertise spans across creating impactful sales funnels, branding, content creation, PPC advertising, SEO, CRO, and email marketing. We leverage advanced AI tools for enhanced copywriting, analytics, and optimization, ensuring we stay at the forefront of marketing trends and technologies.

Job Description:

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Director of Development and Partnerships to lead our efforts in expanding our client portfolio and nurturing strategic partnerships. As a digital marketing agency known for driving business growth through innovative strategies, we are looking for a dynamic and results-oriented professional to join our team.

Key Responsibilities:
• Develop and execute a strategic plan for business growth, including identifying new markets and opportunities.
• Lead the acquisition of new clients, nurturing leads, and managing the sales pipeline.
• Collaborate with the marketing team to create effective marketing campaigns and strategies for client acquisition.
• Identify and establish strategic partnerships with industry leaders, technology providers, and complementary businesses.
• Maintain and nurture relationships with strategic partners
• Negotiate partnership agreements and develop mutually beneficial relationships.
• Leverage partnerships to enhance our service offerings and drive business growth.
• Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients, ensuring high client satisfaction and retention.
• Understand clients' needs and work with Account Managers to provide insights and solutions to drive their success.
• Act as a trusted advisor to clients, offering guidance on digital marketing strategies.
• Work with Account Managers to upsell clients and provide additional services.
• Stay up-to-date with industry trends, market conditions, and competitive landscape.
• Conduct market research to identify emerging opportunities and threats.
• Use data and insights to make informed decisions and recommendations.

Qualifications:
• Bachelor's degree in business, marketing, or a related field; MBA is a plus.
• Proven experience in business development, sales, and partnership management in the digital marketing industry.
• Strong network of industry contacts and partners.
• Exceptional communication and negotiation skills.
• Strategic thinking and a track record of achieving revenue targets.
• Leadership and team management experience.

Benefits:
• Competitive salary and performance-based bonuses.
• Health benefits.
• Opportunities for career growth and advancement.
• A dynamic and collaborative work environment.
